monster.name: Loyal Hound

trait.name: Hit Dice
trait.text: Your Hound has a total number of d8 Hit Dice equal to your Fighter level. It also gains all the normal benefits of both short and long rests.

trait.name: Loyal Companion
trait.text: You add your PB to any ability check or saving throw that your Hound makes.

trait.name: Keen Senses
trait.text: Your Hound has advantage on any ability check that relies on its sense of hearing or smell.

action.name: Bite
action.text: Melee Weapon Attack: +2 +PB to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 1d6 +2 +PB piercing damage. On hit, the target must succeed on a Strength saving throw (DC equals 10 + PB) or be grappled. The Hound can only grapple one creature at a time.

action.name: Maul
action.text: Melee Weapon Attack: +2 +PB to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 1d8 +2 +PB slashing damage.

monster.description: Source: LaserLlama's Martial Archetypes v2.2.0 p. 9 (Homebrew)
